annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The principal amount of the loans borrowed under our Junior Credit Facility is due in full on the maturity date. Interest on the Junior Credit Facility accrues at a rate equal to the greater of (i) 8.50% or (ii) a base rate (being, at our option, either (a) LIBOR for the applicable interest period (adjusted for Eurodollar Reserve Requirements) or (b) the greatest of (x) the prime rate announced Wells Fargo Bank, N.A., the federal funds rate plus 0.50% and (z) one-month adjusted LIBOR plus 1.00%), plus a margin of either 6.5% or 7.5%, based on the base rate selected.
annotations.translation: 根据我们的次级信用贷款借入的贷款本金在到期日全额到期。 次级信用贷款的计息利率等于 (i) 8.50% 或 (ii) 基准利率（由我们选择，即 (a) 适用利息期的伦敦银行同业拆借利率（根据欧洲美元储备要求进行调整）或 (b) (x) 富国银行公布的最优惠利率、联邦基金利率加 0.50% 和 (z) 一个月调整后伦敦银行同业拆借利率加 1.00% 中的最大值），再加上基于所选基准利率的 6.5% 或 7.5% 的保证金，以两者中的较大者为准。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The Company is also required under our Junior Credit Facility to maintain the following financial ratios:
annotations.translation: 我们的初级信贷安排还要求公司维持以下财务比率：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the years ended 31 December 2014 and 2013, the Company capitalised $0.7 million and $0.3 million, respectively, of financing costs related to the Junior Credit Facility, which offset the principal balance. As at 31 December 2014 there was $35.0 million outstanding under the Company's Junior Credit Facility. As at 31 December 2014, the Company was in compliance with all restrictive financial and other covenants under the Junior Credit Facility.
annotations.translation: 截至2014年12月31日和2013年12月31日止年度，公司分别将与初级信贷融通相关的融资成本资本化$70万和$30万，抵消了本金余额。截至 2014 年 12 月 31 日，公司初级信贷安排下尚未偿还 $3,500 万。截至2014年12月31日，公司遵守初级信贷安排下的所有限制性财务和其他契约。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: On 31 December 2012, Sundance Energy entered into a credit agreement with Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (the "Senior Credit Facility"), pursuant to which up to $300 million is available on a revolving basis. The borrowing base under the Senior Credit Facility is determined by reference to the value of the Company's proved reserves. The agreement specifies a semi-annual borrowing base redetermination and the Company can request two additional redeterminations each year. The borrowing capacity was increased from prior year to $110 million as at 31 December 2014 based on Company reserves as at 31 December 2014. As at 31 December 2014, the Company had $15 million undrawn on the Senior Credit Facility. In conjunction with the increase in the borrowing base, the Company has expanded the syndicate of banks under the Senior Credit Facility. With Wells Fargo as administrative agent, Bank of America Merrill Lynch and the Bank of Nova Scotia have now joined the banking group.
annotations.translation: 于2012年12月31日，Sundance Energy与Wells Fargo Bank， N.A.订立信贷协议（“高级信贷融资”），据此，最多$300,000,000可循环使用。高级信贷融资之借贷基础乃参考本公司已证实储备之价值而厘定。协议订明每半年重新厘定借贷基础，而本公司可每年要求额外厘定两次。根据公司于二零一四年十二月三十一日的储备，借贷能力由去年增加至二零一四年十二月三十一日的$110,000,000。于二零一四年十二月三十一日，本公司有$15,000,000未动用高级信贷融资。配合借贷基础的上升，本公司已扩充高级信贷融资项下的银行银团。在富国银行担任行政代理人的情况下，美国银行——美林和新斯科舍银行现已加入该银行集团。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Interest on borrowed funds accrue, at the Company's option, of i) LIBOR plus a margin that ranges from 175 to 275 basis points or ii) the Base Rate, defined as a rate equal to the highest of (a) the Federal Funds Rate plus ½ of 1%, (b) the Prime Rate, or (c) LIBOR plus a margin that ranges from 75 to 175 basis points. The applicable margin varies depending on the amount drawn. The Company also pays a commitment that ranges from 37.5 to 50 basis points on the undrawn balance of the borrowing base. The agreement has a five-year term and contains both negative and affirmative covenants, including minimum current ratio and maximum leverage ratio requirements consistent with the Junior Credit Facility's. Certain development and production assets are pledged as collateral and the facility is guaranteed by the Parent Company.
annotations.translation: 借入资金的利息由公司选择：i） LIBOR加上175至275个基点的保证金或ii）基准利率，定义为等于（a）联邦基金利率加上1%的½ %，（b）最优惠利率，或（c）LIBOR加上75至175个基点的保证金中的最高值。适用的保证金因提取金额而异。公司还就借款基础的未提取余额支付37.5至50个基点的承诺。该协议的期限为五年，包含否定和肯定的契约，包括与初级信贷一致的最低流动比率和最大杠杆比率要求。某些开发和生产资产作为抵押品质押，该设施由母公司担保。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: For the years ended 31 December 2014 and 2013, the Company capitalised nil and $0.2 million, respectively, of financing costs related to the Senior Credit Facility, which offset the principal balance. As at 31 December 2014 there was $95.0 million outstanding under the Company's Senior Credit Facility. As at 31 December 2014, the Company was in compliance with all restrictive financial and other covenants under the Senior Credit Facility.
annotations.translation: 截至2014年及2013年12月31日止年度，本公司分别将与高级信贷融资相关的融资成本资本化为零及$20万，以抵销本金余额。截至2014年12月31日，本公司的高级信贷额度下有$9，500万未偿还款项。截至2014年12月31日，本公司遵守高级信贷下的所有限制性财务及其他契约。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The Company capitalised $3.4 million and $1.3 million of interest expense during the years ended 31 December 2014 and 2013, respectively.
annotations.translation: 截至2014年12月31日和2013年12月31日止年度，公司利息支出资本化分别为$340万和$130万。

annotations.label: Title
annotations.text: NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: a current ratio, consisting of consolidated current assets including undrawn borrowing capacity to consolidated current liabilities, of not less than 1.0 to 1.0 as of the last day of any fiscal quarter;
annotations.translation: 截至任何财政季度的最后一天，包括未提取借款能力在内的合并流动资产与合并流动负债的流动比率不低于 1.0 比 1.0；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: a maximum leverage ratio, consisting of consolidated debt to adjusted consolidated EBITDAX (as defined in the Junior Credit Facility), of not greater than 4.5 to 1.0 as of the last day of any fiscal quarter (beginning 30 September 2013); and
annotations.translation: 截至任何财政季度的最后一天（从2013年9月30日开始），最高杠杆率，包括合并债务与调整后合并EBITDAX（定义见初级信贷额度），不大于4.5至1.0;和

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: an asset coverage ratio, consisting of PV10 to consolidated debt, of not less than 1.5 to 1.0, as of certain test dates.
annotations.translation: 资产覆盖率包括 PV10 与合并债务，截至某些测试日期，不低于 1.5 至 1.0。
